title: Baker's Introductory Press Conference
description:
Laura Rutledge and the NFL Live Crew discuss Baker Mayfield’s introductory press conference as a Carolina Panther, Gronk’s comments on his retirement status and the top 10 running backs for the 2022 season. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: Baker introduces himself to Carolina and the Top 10 running backs for the 2022 season.
